reviews.customers_say: Customers appreciate the cardigan's 100% cotton fabric and find it well-made, lightweight, and comfortable. Customers disagree on the sizing, with some finding it true to size while others say it's too short.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Florida
items.body: Nice sweater. I need a black cardigan for cool weather in FL. The fact that its cotton sold me. It's alittle scratchy for cotton but I liked the style and I'll only wear it a few hours on cool days. The lenght is nice, not to short or to long and the sleeves are a tad long but I just turned the cuff up. I haven't washed it yet but I'll hang to dry. All in all a nice fitting lightweight sweater. Read more
items.author: Kim G.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great everyday cardigan!
items.body: I really like this cardigan. the material feels soft, breathable, and comfortable since it’s 100% cotton. It’s lightweight but still gives enough warmth for layering. The fit is flattering and true to size, and it looks nice whether I wear it with jeans or over a dress. The quality seems good so far, and it held up well after washing without shrinking or losing shape. It’s simple, classic, and perfect for work or casual wear. Definitely a good basic piece to have in your wardrobe. Read more
items.author: Nigar Kazan

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good value and style
items.body: This cardigan is great quality and I like that it’s 100% cotton. It washed up well and hope that it continues to hold up with more washing. I ordered 2 colors - I wanted the pink color in size small but it sold out quickly. Read more
items.author: SSannS

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feel, Fit, Foxy
items.body: Classic sweater, perfect fit, chic look! Read more
items.author: Picky. Extremely.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a great sweater for yourself or as a gift!
items.body: This was a perfect sweater. It wasn’t too heavy. It’s great material. It’s very attractive. It looks good on me and it goes with everything. I love it. It doesn’t make you feel too hot when you go into a house in the winter for the holidays. The price was excellent. Read more
items.author: Joanna Lowry

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars No Shape to it.
items.body: It’s ok for the price but it’s too long for a modern look and the ribbed part at the bottom gets all wavy after washing. Read more
items.author: Carol Matrisciano

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I like the chocolate brown.
items.body: Accurate fit, comfortable cotton. Nice color chocolate brown. I'm 155 lb. 5'6" Large fit well. No Shrinkage. Good quality, medium thickness. Read more
items.author: SANDRA A.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soft Cotton sweater good for layering or for wearing over a sleeveless dress
items.body: Not so much as expected. Its hard to find Cotton products so I will Keep it. The color Greene is nice and I can wear it over a top. Good for spring and the fall. The knit is soft and light. Not thick. Good for layering. Read more
items.author: Hilary O'Gorman

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: V-Neck B-yellow, Crewneck A-blue, V-Neck B-blue, Crewneck A-yellow, Crewneck A-orange, Crewneck A-green, V-Neck B-kelly Green, V-Neck B-light Blue, Crewneck A-royal Blue, V-Neck B-red, Crewneck A-khaki, V-Neck B-black, Crewneck A-white, Crewneck A-black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
